title: Please fix your client
body:
MY CLIENT KEEPS ON FREEZING OUT OF NOWHERE
This never happened on the previous client or patches after the new client was released
I constantly lose LP from my client freezing during champ select and lost so many promo games due to this.
Have a prevention loss and a LP loss for this. This isn't my mistake it yours.
Tired of having these waits when it isn't my fault.

replies.body:
If you're consistently freezing during champion selects in ranked queues, it might be a good idea at this point to take a step back and try to figure out why your network keeps losing it's connection with our servers before you loose anymore LP.

I've been seeing a good number of packet loss issues this morning, which is a bit concerning. I'd like to check for this first since typically packet loss originates from outside of your network and can be a little hard to smooth out. Grab some network logs from a game that was lagging if possible, and let our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan it. Post that image here for me and I can go over it with you!

http://imgur.com/a/M3CNE
these are 6 logs from today in order. 
my pings are fine most of the time and its only sometimes when my game freezes IN-GAME.
everytime i play league i only have the game opened up.

Yea it looks like some of that packet loss might be the main issue behind those freezes, but let's go ahead and run a quick repair through the client options just to be safe. Test that repair in a custom game to see if that helps, and if not hit up our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with some of those logs!
And games declining by itself soon as it pops up it gives me a choice to accept or decline
